Phutawan Sastakom

Chiang Mai 50200 · 0830995092 · qutawan.sattakom@email.com

I’m a 3D and 2D games artist specializing in environment design — crafting playable, atmospheric scenes that support gameplay and storytelling while collaborating closely with designers and programmers

Experience

Create a 3D model

I built the 3D map for The Haunted Manor project.

I designed maps for a story-driven puzzle game that blends ancient Chinese culture, beliefs about spirits, and traditional Qing Dynasty Chinese houses. The atmosphere features thick fog, flickering lantern light, grass covering the houses, and is surrounded by bamboo forests.

October 2024 - March 2025

Create a map in the game 2D pixel art.

Building maps in "LET HIM COOK"

I have drawn and composed the maps; there are a total of four maps in this game. Each map maintains a consistent color scheme and conveys a different mood. They are created using pixel art techniques with a top-down view.

June 2024 - October 2024

Create a map in the game 3D

Create a map in the game "Mysterious Time"

I designed a game map with an top down view, simulating a classroom environment. The color scheme is mainly black and red to create a creepy atmosphere for the players.

Interests

Apart from being a game artist, I spend most of my time exploring different creative outlets. I enjoy experimenting with digital painting and pixel art to bring unique game worlds to life. When not working on art During breaks, I like visiting art galleries and attending game development meetups to stay inspired. I also enjoy learning new software and tools that enhance my skills in 3D modeling and concept art.

When indoors, I dive into fantasy and sci-fi stories through books, movies, and games, which fuel my imagination for creating compelling visuals in my projects.
